Package perfcenter.simulator

This package contains the improved classes over almost all classes of perfcenter.baseclass package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeviceSim
    Contains simulation structures and simulation logic for Device.
    DistributedSystemSim
    This has all the distributed system parameters as given in input file.
    Event
    This class has handling methods for all types of events.
    ExponentialDistribution
    Exponential distribution which will give the random numbers from distribution exp(l) given the mean l.
    HostSim
    Inherits from Host.
    LanLinkSim
    Inherits from LanLink.
    PerfSim
    This is the main class that performs simulation.
    ScenarioSim
    Contains simulation book-keeping for the Scenario object.
    SimulationParameters
    This class contains actual book-keepings done during simulation.
    SoftServerSim  
    VirtualResSim  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventType
    This defines all the events handled by simulation

Package perfcenter.simulator Description

This package contains the improved classes over almost all classes of perfcenter.baseclass package.

They are used for storing the simulation-time book-keepings of the basic components of distributed system.
